name: MovieGeek
0:
”Alexa, open Movie Geek”
”Alexa, start Movie Geek”
”Alexa, ask Movie Geek to start a game”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: movie geek
des: Alexa will ask movie trivia questions and you tell her the answer. She'll also keep score as you go and announce your final score at the end. You can ask Alexa to repeat the question or stop the game at any time.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
